first_para: Ian Blackford (born 14 May 1961) is a Scottish politician who lives on Skye. He was formerly the National Treasurer of the Scottish National Party. Since 2002, together with his wife Ann, he has ran a consultancy business called First Seer. Amongst other things Ian and Ann run a croft on the isle of Skye. He previously worked in the financial industry.

He previously worked in the financial industry.
full.title: Ian Blackford
